title: Repair Question
body: How long does it generally take? My client has been repairing for a good 30 Minutes now and it's scanned around 3700 Files already. How long does the Repair usually take?

replies.body: well time flies when you are having fun. so play the waiting game
yeah it does warn you it could take a couple of hours.
depends on internet could take 10mins-3 or more hrs
